original_title: ラブライブ！虹ヶ咲学園スクールアイドル同好会 5th Live! 虹が咲く場所
overview: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club 5th Live! Nijigasaku Basho (ラブライブ！虹ヶ咲学園スクールアイドル同好会 5th Live! 虹が咲く場所 Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club 5th Live! Where the Rainbow Blooms) is Nijigasaki High School Idol Club's fifth solo live concert that took place in the following locations:  Colorful Dreams! Colorful Smiles!: Tokyo Garden Theater in Tokyo on September 10 and 11, 2022  Next TOKIMEKI: Musashino Forest Sport Plaza in Tokyo on September 17 and 18, 2022
title: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club 5th Live! Where the Rainbow Blooms
